findings.title: _receivePOS32From() ignores return value by IERC20(POS32).transferFrom
findings.description: The function _receivePOS32From() does not check the return value of IERC20(POS32).transferFrom, which can lead to unexpected behavior.

findings.title: _sendRethTo ignores return value by IERC20(rocketTokenRETHAddress).transfer
findings.description: The function _sendRethTo does not check the return value of IERC20(rocketTokenRETHAddress).transfer, which may lead to unexpected behavior.

findings.title: _sendPOS32To ignores return value by IERC20(POS32).transfer
findings.description: The function _sendPOS32To does not check the return value of IERC20(POS32).transfer, which may lead to unexpected behavior.

findings.title: _burnPOS32 ignores return value by IERC20(POS32).transfer
findings.description: The _burnPOS32 function does not check the return value of the IERC20(POS32).transfer call, which can lead to unintended behavior and potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can change ETH2Token ratio
findings.description: The owner has privileges to modify the ETH2Token ratio, which may lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Owner can change tokenBurnBIPS value
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the tokenBurnBIPS value, which may lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Owner can change protocol wallet
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the protocol wallet, which may lead to unauthorized changes and potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can change lastRewardTime and endTime
findings.description: The owner has privileges to modify lastRewardTime and endTime variables.
